SEARCH
Package com.mbi_re.airport_management.controller

Class TimeZoneController

java.lang.Object
com.mbi_re.airport_management.controller.TimeZoneController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/timezones") public class TimeZoneController extends Object
REST controller for managing time zones in the system.

This controller provides an endpoint to fetch all time zones available for the current tenant. It supports both authenticated and unauthenticated requests:

  • Authenticated: Tenant is validated from the JWT (via TenantContext).
  • Unauthenticated: Tenant must be provided via the X-Tenant-ID header.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • getAllTimeZones

      @GetMapping @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'USER\') or hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") @Cacheable("timezones") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<TimeZoneDTO>> getAllTimeZones(@RequestHeader(value="X-Tenant-ID",required=false) String tenantHeader)
      Retrieves a list of all supported time zones for the current tenant.

      This endpoint may be accessed by:

      • Authenticated users (JWT token with tenant info)
      • Unauthenticated clients providing X-Tenant-ID in the request header
      Parameters:
      tenantHeader - Optional X-Tenant-ID header for unauthenticated requests. If present, it must match the tenant from the current context.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the list of TimeZoneDTOs or a 403 Forbidden response if tenant validation fails.
